posts.name: Tanya kamboj
posts.cooked:
Hii all…i know this may not be the correct platform to ask this question.
Actually i have 3 diploma subjects to cover - MLP, JAVA, TDS. So which 2 subject should i choose for this term?

posts.name: Rajat Goel
posts.cooked: Don’t take TDS, this subject should be taken in the end else you might have some problem

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
TDS at the end best. Gives you the best chance of doing well in it.

Kind regards

posts.name: Aditya choudhary
posts.cooked: Yes you should do tds after mlp only it really help you alot trust me

posts.name: Akash kumbhakar
posts.cooked: You should focus on TDS at latter stage of your diploma
